data.title: Pogue on LinkedIn: A broken crayon still colors. You don't have to be 'perfect' to make your…
data.meta_description:
A broken crayon still colors.

You don't have to be 'perfect' to make your mark or create something beautiful.

Your 'broken' parts and imperfections make you…
data.text:
“𝑭𝒊𝒏𝒅𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒎𝒐𝒏𝒚 𝒃𝒆𝒕𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒏 𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒅𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒎𝒔 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒇𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒂𝒔𝒑𝒊𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔 𝒊𝒔 𝒍𝒊𝒌𝒆 𝒃𝒍𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒄𝒐𝒍𝒐𝒓𝒔 𝒐𝒏 𝒂 𝒄𝒂𝒏𝒗𝒂𝒔, 𝒄𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒂 𝒎𝒂𝒔𝒕𝒆𝒓𝒑𝒊𝒆𝒄𝒆 𝒖𝒏𝒊𝒒𝒖𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒚𝒐𝒖." – 𝑫𝒓. 𝑱𝒂𝒎𝒆𝒔 𝑩𝒓𝒚𝒂𝒏𝒕 🖌️Blue is a gorgeous color—calming and happy. Yellow is also stunning—creative and inspiring. Apart, they are equally lovely and can be used to create many things. 🎨But what if we mix the two colors? A little bit of yellow into the blue? What a lovely new shade of teal or green or aquamarine, depending on how much yellow we add. That’s what it’s like when we learn how to make a harmonious mixture of our personal and professional lives. 🖼️Our personal life, like the blue, calming and happy. Home, family, friends… Our professional life, like the yellow, is creative and inspiring. Promotions, deadlines, growth… 🖌️The new color, a harmonious blend of these two lovely colors… unique to you… a masterpiece. 🎨With these new possibilities and colors, each stroke on the canvas of life becomes vibrant in the big picture. #𝑬𝒏𝒈𝒊𝒏𝒆𝒆𝒓𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓𝑺𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 #𝑩𝒆𝑩𝒆𝒕𝒕𝒆𝒓 #𝑮𝒓𝒐𝒘 #𝑷𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍𝑮𝒓𝒐𝒘𝒕𝒉 #𝑷𝒐𝒅𝒄𝒂𝒔𝒕 #𝑰𝒏𝒔𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒔 #𝑨𝒅𝒗𝒊𝒄𝒆 #𝑺𝒆𝒍𝒇𝑨𝒘𝒂𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒆𝒔𝒔 #𝑷𝒐𝒘𝒆𝒓𝑾𝒊𝒕𝒉𝒊𝒏 #𝑻𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒔𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 #𝑻𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒔𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎

𝓗𝓮𝔂 𝓛𝓲𝓷𝓴𝓮𝓭𝓘𝓷 𝓕𝓪𝓶! 👋 𝟏. 𝑩𝒐𝒍𝒅 𝑺𝒕𝒓𝒐𝒌𝒆𝒔: Life rewards the daring, the ones who pick up their brushes with courage. 𝟐. 𝑩𝒆𝒂𝒖𝒕𝒊𝒇𝒖𝒍 𝑪𝒉𝒐𝒊𝒄𝒆𝒔: Each decision is a stroke of beauty, creating patterns that tell the story of who we are. Choose colors that resonate with your authenticity and illuminate the canvas of your journey. 𝟑. 𝑪𝒓𝒂𝒇𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒂 𝑴𝒂𝒔𝒕𝒆𝒓𝒑𝒊𝒆𝒄𝒆: In every challenge, in every triumph, we hold the brush that shapes our destiny. Let's be intentional with our strokes, creating a masterpiece that reflects our dreams, passions, and the essence of our true selves. 𝟒. 𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑷𝒂𝒍𝒆𝒕𝒕𝒆, 𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑺𝒕𝒐𝒓𝒚: What colors are you choosing for your canvas today? Share in the comments, and let's inspire each other to paint our stories with boldness and beauty! 🎨✨ #colorpalette #personalgrowth #linkedingrowth #linkedinforcreators #linkedincommunity #personalbranding #personaldevelopment #personalbrandingtips

The picture below is extremely important to all of us & we should STRONGLY watch out for it. You don’t believe me? Think good. Think again. OK.. this white paper is very clear & clean.. you can write, draw or even do anything. At the end, it will be one final product no matter if it was organized & well filled or even scrashed. NOW.. Imagine you add more & more papers.. At the end, you can have one full package either well prepared or totally disaster. The white page is your day every morning. Good painting = wonderful results Bad scrashing = distroied life It’s your Choice. Handle it the you want to see it at the end of the day.. week.. month.. year.. etc.

“𝑭𝒊𝒏𝒅𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒎𝒐𝒏𝒚 𝒃𝒆𝒕𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒏 𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒅𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒎𝒔 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒇𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒂𝒔𝒑𝒊𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔 𝒊𝒔 𝒍𝒊𝒌𝒆 𝒃𝒍𝒆𝒏𝒅𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒄𝒐𝒍𝒐𝒓𝒔 𝒐𝒏 𝒂 𝒄𝒂𝒏𝒗𝒂𝒔, 𝒄𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒂 𝒎𝒂𝒔𝒕𝒆𝒓𝒑𝒊𝒆𝒄𝒆 𝒖𝒏𝒊𝒒𝒖𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒚𝒐𝒖." – 𝑫𝒓. 𝑱𝒂𝒎𝒆𝒔 𝑩𝒓𝒚𝒂𝒏𝒕 🖌️Blue is a gorgeous color—calming and happy. Yellow is also stunning—creative and inspiring. Apart, they are equally lovely and can be used to create many things. 🎨But what if we mix the two colors? A little bit of yellow into the blue? What a lovely new shade of teal or green or aquamarine, depending on how much yellow we add. That’s what it’s like when we learn how to make a harmonious mixture of our personal and professional lives. 🖼️Our personal life, like the blue, calming and happy. Home, family, friends… Our professional life, like the yellow, is creative and inspiring. Promotions, deadlines, growth… 🖌️The new color, a harmonious blend of these two lovely colors… unique to you… a masterpiece. 🎨With these new possibilities and colors, each stroke on the canvas of life becomes vibrant in the big picture. #𝑬𝒏𝒈𝒊𝒏𝒆𝒆𝒓𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓𝑺𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 #𝑩𝒆𝑩𝒆𝒕𝒕𝒆𝒓 #𝑮𝒓𝒐𝒘 #𝑷𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍𝑮𝒓𝒐𝒘𝒕𝒉 #𝑷𝒐𝒅𝒄𝒂𝒔𝒕 #𝑰𝒏𝒔𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒔 #𝑨𝒅𝒗𝒊𝒄𝒆 #𝑺𝒆𝒍𝒇𝑨𝒘𝒂𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒆𝒔𝒔 #𝑷𝒐𝒘𝒆𝒓𝑾𝒊𝒕𝒉𝒊𝒏 #𝑻𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒔𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 #𝑻𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒔𝒇𝒐𝒓𝒎

Life's a Canvas 🎨✨ Picture this: Your mind, a blank canvas, waits for the masterpiece to begin. 🖌️🧠 You're the artist, the creator of your world, so why choose dull colors? 🌈🌟 Let's pick the vibrant ones – courage, joy, and dreams brushed boldly. 🎨💪🌼 Splash optimism, swirl resilience, and don't forget the glitter of humor! ✨😄 Each stroke, a moment; each hue, an emotion; each piece, a story. 📖🖼️ Life's canvas is yours, paint it with vibrant thoughts. 🧘♂️🌞 Dare to create your masterpiece, because every day is a new stroke. 🎆🖌️ Express yourself, embrace the mess, and let your heart be your guide. 💖🗺️ #PaintYourWorld #MasterpieceInMaking

Buckle up - this one is meant for those struggling to grow. That graphic is why the change starts with you. 👀 How you see the world impacts how you move within it... 👀 How you see opportunities/challenges... 👀 How you see people... ...is all painted with *your colors* ⚫ Are you painting with just black & white? 🔘 Shades of gray? 🌈 The Crayola 8-pack? How much color - how many concepts, types of people, circumstances different from your life... how many alternative perspectives have you invited into your palette? When you challenge yourself to *see* more or different, *feel* more or different, *behave* with a greater range - you paint with more colors. You can operate within a bigger world in a bigger, more impactful way. If you want growth, clean up the biases, assumptions, and limiting beliefs that limit your palette. An entire color wheel awaits 🎨 *graphic text inspired by the lyrics of Hate You by Jungkook #mindset #emotionalintelligence #selfawareness #curiosityunleashed #growthmindset

💌 **Reader's Submission from the Grit and Grace Community**: Hello, dear #GritAndGraceTribe, Ever had a canvas presented to you, marred with splatters and streaks? I did. Not a physical one, but the canvas of life. It was at a time when every phone call brought bad news, every letter was a bill or rejection, and every reflection in the mirror questioned my worth. Life's unfairness was that messy, chaotic canvas. In one of those reflective moments, a quote wrapped around my thoughts: _"Life's unfairness is the canvas; your actions are the masterpiece."_ This was my cue. Instead of lamenting the dark patches, I chose to pick up the brush and paint my story. To reframe challenges as opportunities, to see the splatters as abstract art. My journey of reframing led me to various inspirations, one of which was a collection of stories and lessons – a lot like the tales we share here. Among them, I chanced upon a [book](https://amzn.to/48cj711) that spoke of life's canvases and how the brave hearts crafted them into art. If your canvas feels a bit tangled and chaotic now, remember you hold the brush. And if you've painted over life's unfair splatters to create something beautiful, reach out and DM us. Let's celebrate the masterpieces we create amidst chaos. #PaintingLife #Resilience #LifeJourney #GritAndGraceStories #MasterpieceInTheMaking #ShareYourStory
